examples: "Are we too early?" "No, your timing is perfect - dinner is almost ready."

definitions.definition: the hours when someone is usually at work, or when an office or business is open
the ability to do something at exactly the right time:
examples: To be a good tennis player, you have to have good timing.

definitions.definition: the ability to play or sing all the notes in a piece of music at the correct speed and rhythm:
examples: There are one or two places where the timing isn't quite right.
